item.title: Jayne add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jayne add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "Imagining something is better than remembering something." -- John Irving

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "What you risk reveals what you value." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "I took a deep breath and listened to the old brag of my heart. I am, I am, I am." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Kiss me, and you will see how important I am." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Lily Tomlin
item.description: "The trouble with being in the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat." -- Lily Tomlin

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you pick up a starving dog and make him prosperous he will not bite you. This is the principal difference between a dog and man." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jayne add a quote by May Sarton
item.description: "We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be." -- May Sarton

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Time doth flit; oh shit." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "I don't know if God exists, but it would be better for His reputation if He didn't." -- Jules Renard

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Sara Nelson
item.description: "When things go right, I read. When things go wrong, I read more." -- Sara Nelson

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "Reading is the sole means by which we slip, involuntarily, often helplessly, into another's skin, another's voice, another's soul." -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: Jayne add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Great books write themselves, only bad books have to be written." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Jayne add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "All good writing is like swimming underwater and holding your breath." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Dean Young
item.description: "A poem should be odd as a small cast-iron platypus." -- Dean Young

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I recognize terror as the finest emotion and so I will try to terrorize the reader. But if I find that I cannot terrify, I will try to horrify, and if I find that I cannot horrify, I'll go for the gross-out. I'm not proud. " -- Stephen King

item.title: Jayne add a quote by John Ashbery
item.description: "In the increasingly convincing darkness The words become palpable, like a fruit That is too beautiful to eat. " -- John Ashbery

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "Time that withers you will wither me. We will fall like ripe fruit and roll down the grass together. Dear friend, let me lie beside you watching the clouds until the earth covers us and we are gone." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Jayne add a quote by Wallace Stevens
item.description: "We live in an old chaos of the sun." -- Wallace Stevens

item.title: Jayne add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris
